info.sourceTextContent: --Toda injuria que me dirijas ahora la llevaré con paciencia. Soy culpada, muy culpada: pero te juro que jamás preví que pudieran haber tenido mis culpas tan fatales consecuencias para ti. Quisiera yo volverte la paz a costa de mi sangre.
info.suspiciousTextContent: - Any injury which I now take her with patience. I am guilty, very guilty, but I swear I never foresaw that my sins could have had such fatal consequences for you. Would I make you peace at the expense of my blood
